channel.title: operator,schema,kusto,sqlserver on Azure Schema Operator
channel.description: Recent content in operator,schema,kusto,sqlserver on Azure Schema Operator

item.description: Azure-Schema-Operator # Note: The API is expected to change (while adhering to semantic versioning). Alpha and Beta resources are generally not recommended for production environments. Alpha, Beta, and Stable mean roughly the same for this project as they do for all Kubernetes features. Azure Schema Operator project is aimed to manage a schema changes of varios Azure Resources (e.g. Azure SQL, Azure Data Explorer, Azure EventsHub) using declarative approach via Kubernetes resources.
